### Subgrup A

```{r echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
teamnames <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/teamlist.csv")
data <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/tercerapreview.csv")
table <- data %>% filter(league == 'tercera_a')
table <- teamnames %>% left_join(table, by = "team") %>% arrange(desc(proj.points))
table <- table[complete.cases(table),]
table <- table %>% select(-fullname,-team, -league)
kable(table, digits = 1, align = 'lccccccc', row.names = FALSE, col.names = c('Club', 'Punts', 'GD', '1-3', '4-6','7-11', 'Favor', 'Contra', 'Qualitat')) %>% add_header_above(c('Primer Fase de 2020-2021' = 1, 'Projecci贸' = 2, 'Probabilitat (%)' = 3, 'xGols' = 3)) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T) %>% column_spec(3, border_right = T) %>% column_spec(6, border_right = T)
```
